Met talented and hardworking folks working to help create Mitchelville Freedom Park at the site of historic Mitchelville. It was the site of the first self governed settlement of formerly enslaved people in the United States. Look forward to watching this project develop. (8/10)

She pursued an incredible career - appointed as the U.S. Ambassador to the U.N., and made history as the first woman to serve as the Secretary of State. She was later awarded the Presidential Medal of Freedom by President Obama for her work to shape our country's foreign policy.

In honor of the late Secretary Madeleine Albright, and of #WomensHistoryMonth, I think it's important for us all to know about her life and work.
